#pragma config(Sensor, S1,     SOUND_LEFT,          sensorSoundDB)
#pragma config(Sensor, S2,     SOUND_RIGHT,         sensorNone)
//*!!Code automatically generated by 'ROBOTC' configuration wizard               !!*//

#define SPEED_FACT 1
#define MOTOR_LEFT motorC
#define MOTOR_RIGHT motorB
#define SOUND_THRESHOLD_HIGH 90
task main(){
  int valueL,valueR;
  int diff;
  while (1)
{
valueL = SensorValue( SOUND_LEFT );
valueR = SensorValue( SOUND_RIGHT );
if ( valueL < SOUND_THRESHOLD_HIGH && valueR < SOUND_THRESHOLD_HIGH )
{
motor[ MOTOR_LEFT ] = 0;
motor[ MOTOR_RIGHT ] = 0;
continue;
}
diff = valueL - valueR;
motor[ MOTOR_LEFT ] = 10-SPEED_FACT*diff;
motor[ MOTOR_RIGHT ] = 10+SPEED_FACT*diff;
}
}
